text: What's your reason for getting out of bed each morning? Who motivates you?

paraphrases.text: Why do you get out of bed each morning?
What motivates you to get out of bed each morning?
For what reason do you get out of bed each morning?

qpairs.question: What are 5 good reasons for getting out of bed and staying up?
qpairs.answer:
Work
Play
Exercise
Make friends
Find someone to go back to bed with...
qpairs.simplified_answer: Work, play, exercise, make friends, find someone to go back to bed with...
qpairs.summarized_answer: Work, play, exercise, make friends, find someone to go back to bed with...

qpairs.question: What makes you get out of bed every day?
qpairs.answer:
My alarm.

and the fact that I have to go to school.
qpairs.simplified_answer: The alarm clock and the fact that I have to go to school.
qpairs.summarized_answer: The alarm clock and the fact that I have to go to school.
